features: 1. Sciatica Tailbone Coccyx Seat Cushion for Office Chair: This seat cushion and back cushion for office home chair helps alleviate sciatica and lower back pain. Our lumbar support pillow and orthopedic seat cushions are designed to help relieve pressure on your tailbone, lower back, and spine while sitting.

2. Premium Memory Foam Seat Cushion Back & Butt Pillow for Sciatica Tailbone Coccyx Hip Pain Relief: These office seat cushions and back pillow combo are made of the latest technology slow-rebound memory foam with lycra cover that can sense the memory curve of the human body, reduce pressure on the coccyx/tailbone, promotes healthy posture. Seat cushions back hollow perforated provide great air circulation and allow you to sit without feeling hot or sweaty, breathable, and supportive.

3. Office Home Chair Seat Cushion for Tailbone Pain: Our coccyx seat cushion for the office is butterfly shaped ergonomic designed and recommended by orthopedic surgeons for the treatment of chronic or acute pain by alleviating pressure in strategic areas: Relieving Sciatica, Arthritis, low back, hip, spine, post-surgery injury or pregnancy pain relief. Can be used to improve bad posture and relieve leg pain while driving or sitting for long periods.

4. Lumbar Support Pillow for Back Pain Sciatica Relief: The back cushion for a desk chair repeats the anatomical contours of your spine, supports your lumbar area, improves blood flow, and relieves pressure on your back. Our back support cushions can be placed anywhere along the back of a car seat or office chair for neck, lower back, and spine pain relief. The lumbar support pillow is one of the essential work-from-home accessories relieving pain points while working from home for long hours.

5. Breathable & Washable Back Cushions & Seat Cushions: Anti-Sweat absorbent material keeps air circulation to keep comfortable for long periods with a removable cover that is easy for cleaning. Sitting Pressure can accumulate day by day and lead to sitting pain finally no matter how old you are. Working is long term and sitting takes a long too. With non-slip grip dots and a fully breathable cover, the stuffed seat cushion keeps in place and stands up to cool for long-sitting pain relief use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MERMONY FOAM SEAT CUSHION & LUMBAR SUPPORT PILLOW
Corrective Sitting Posture The back cushion provides a perfect blend of comfort and support for your upper, mid, or low back.

QA Q: Will this work on a chair without arms? A: Yes! As long as the chair has a back to it, the seat and the backrest portion of the product work well Q: Is it good for petite women? A: It’s good for anyone and for a smaller person it actually gives you a better view Q: The pack is included the back cushion and seat cushion? A: Yes, The pack included 1 pcs seat cushion, and 1 pcs back cushion. Q: Does the memory foam lumbar cushion and seat cushion have good support? A: Yes. It is comfortable and it's two pieces that can be adjusted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are quality and comfort
reviews.reviewText: Much surprised to find these cushions far better than I expected. Nice quality, holds their shape and gives me the support I was seeking = highly recommend them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Didn't work for me
reviews.reviewText: These cushions were very well made but they just didn't help my problem. I could tell they would be good for some problems and probably a chair better than my office chair. The seller was very easy to work for and gave me a refund after a couple days use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars quality and is as ordered (nosurprises)
reviews.reviewText: the massage is fantastic, love the auto off feature

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I want to give 5 stars
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought these for my power wheelchair as I am in constant pain while using it. This combo back/seat cushion is far superior to the previous seat cushion I bought. It really has made a huge difference. I am plus size yet they both offer great support and the memory foam doesn't squish down to a pancake. It's not perfect, I still have pain but they allow me to sit for a longer period of time and in more comfort. BUT...I have only had these a short while and I saw that one of the straps on the back cushion is almost torn through already even though it isn't even a tight fit around the back of my chair. I am going to need to replace it even though it's been less than a month and I don't know how I will manage that because I absolutely need it every day and every time I sit. So if I return it I won't be able to use my wheelchair until the replacement arrives. If it wasn't for the ripping strap I would give 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a must use before you really like it.
reviews.reviewText: Pain relief, stability. adjustability and comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It actually helps relieve the pain in my coccyx.
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased so many of these types of cushions and this one is actually effective. The sides slope up slightly and that seems to keep the tailbone centered on the opening. Also the back is just slightly thicker than the front of the seat cushion. The fabric is smooth but not slippery. I am not constantly adjusting my position. It really is comfortable. I have an attic full of cushions for coccyx pain and back pain that made the discomfort worse, so I consider this one a real find!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Foam is thick and insulates; the heat helps with my lower back pain on longer drives.
reviews.reviewText: I drive for a living, sometimes driving for hour-long stretches. I have issues with my lower back tightening up when driving for long periods of time, and had been using a tennis ball to alleviate some pain. This seat cushion has helped significantly with a recent roadtrip from Washington state to Nevada. The padding is thick, but not too firm. It insulates heat, which sounds inconvenient at first. But I believe the heat helps with the lower back pain. I prefer to use the back cushion more than the seat cushion (the seat cushion shifts between seatings too much for my preference).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not the best
reviews.reviewText: This really did nothing for my back. I could not keep it from slipping around on the chair.
